archimate:Requirement.name: SC.1.4.3: The required combination of tools and techniques, used to assess a supplier's security arrangements, should be determined at an early stage of the supplier relationship (e.g. prior to the agreement of a contract).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
